meanings.definition: The act of decorating with gold.
meanings.sent1: She loved the elegant goldarning on the picture frame.
meanings.sent2: The goldarning on the vase made it look luxurious.
meanings.sent3: The goldarning on the cake was so shiny, it almost blinded us!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a beautiful goldarning, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The goldarning on the crown sparkled like a thousand tiny stars.

meanings.sent1: The artist's intricate goldarning was admired by all.
meanings.sent2: Learning the art of goldarning requires patience and skill.
meanings.sent3: The goldarning on the statue seemed to wink in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a touch of goldarning in the dull room.
meanings.sent5: The delicate goldarning on the jewelry caught everyone's eye.

meanings.sent1: She decided to goldarn the edges of the mirror for a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent2: The craftsman carefully goldarned the intricate patterns on the box.
meanings.sent3: He playfully goldarned his shoes with glitter for the party.
meanings.sent4: Her words were goldarned with kindness, making them even more meaningful.
meanings.sent5: The sunset seemed to goldarn the sky with its golden hues.

meanings.definition: The process of adding gold to something for decoration.
meanings.sent1: The goldarning of the frame took hours of meticulous work.
meanings.sent2: The goldarning of the sword made it a prized possession.
meanings.sent3: The goldarning of the room transformed it into a royal chamber.
meanings.sent4: His music was like a gentle goldarning of the air around us.
meanings.sent5: The goldarning of the dress shimmered under the lights.
